mapper.insert: insert into personal_rank(rank_name, user_id, category_id, target_id) VALUES (#{rankName},#{userId},#{categoryId},#{targetId})

insert into rank_song(rank_id, song_id, ranking) VALUES
(#{item.rankId},#{item.songId},#{item.ranking})
mapper.select: select singer_id,singer_name from singer where category_id=#{categoryId} and singer_status=1
select song_id,song.song_name from song where singer_id=#{singerId} and song_status=1
select count(*) from vote_record where ip=#{ip} and rank_id=#{rankId}

select a.rank_id,a.rank_name,a.total_vote as vote_count,a.total_love as love_count,a.publish_time, b.rs_id,b.song_id,b.ranking,b.rank_update_time,c.song_name from (select p.rank_id,p.rank_name,ifnull(sum(v.vote),0) as total_vote,p.publish_time, ifnull(sum(l.love),0) as total_love from personal_rank as p left join vote_record as v on v.rank_id=p.rank_id left join love_record as l on l.rank_id=p.rank_id where p.category_id=#{categoryId} group by p.rank_id, p.rank_name, p.publish_time order by publish_time asc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}) a left join rank_song as b on a.rank_id = b.rank_id left join song as c on c.song_id=b.song_id order by b.rank_update_time asc, b.ranking asc
